name: Survival Instincts
effect: You suffer no penalties while Injured. If you are Injured at the start of your turn, you gain Regeneration.

name: Grit and Resolve
effect: Your Melee attacks deal additional damage equal to the numer of Persistent Wounds you are currently suffering.

name: Feline Grace
effect: You gain +1 to all your Agility rolls.

name: Brute Force
effect: You gain +1 to all your Strength rolls.

name: Perfect Shape
effect: You gain +1 to all your Toughness rolls.

name: Iron Mind
effect: You gain +1 to all your Willpower rolls.

name: Opportunist
effect: You have Advantage when making Opportunity Attacks, and they deal +5 damage.

name: Blood Thirst
effect: Melee or Ranged Attacks made against Bleeding targets deal +5 damage, and you gain Regeneration.

name: Panic Shroud
effect: When you suffer 8 or more wounds from a single attack, you immediately gain Shroud.

name: Shroud Walker
effect: While under Shroud you don't provoke Attacks of Opportunity, and your Movement is increased by 1.

name: Shroud Master
effect: When you gain Shroud you remove a condition from you, and attacks made while in Shroud deal +5 damage.

name: Second Skin
effect: Wearing a Light Armor gives you +1 to Armor.

name: Unhindered
effect: Heavy Armor does not slow your Movement, and your Dodge rolls while wearing Heavy Armor only suffer a -1 penalty.

name: Opening Strikes
effect: When you hit a target with a Melee or Ranged Attack, if the target is at full health your attack deals +15 damage.

name: Lone Wolf
effect: If there are no active allies within 2 squares from you when performing an Attack, your attack deal +5 damage.

name: Oppressive Threatener
effect: Your allies have Advantage when attacking any creature Threatened by you.

name: Threatening Attacks
effect: Whenever you attack an enemy, whether you hit or miss, you may Threaten that enemy.

name: Battlefield Superiority
effect: Enemies (in your melee range) Threatened by you provoke an Opportunity Attack (from you) when they move or make an attack that does not include you amongst their targets.

name: Footwork Advantage
effect: Your Melee and Ranged attacks deal +5 damage against Immobilized, Crippled, Chilled or Prone targets.

name: Precise Aim
effect: You do not have disadvantage for attacking creature 5 squares from you or more.

name: Combat Spellcaster
effect: Casting Spells does not provoke Opportunity Attacks, and you can cast Spells while wearing Armor and/or Shields.

name: Spellblade
effect: While wielding a weapon and an attunement, your [Weapon] and [Spell] power are both increased by 2.

name: Two-Handed Mastery
effect: Your Melee Attacks made with a two-handed weapon deal +4 damage.

name: Heavy Weapon Mastery
effect: Your Melee Attacks made with a one-handed heavy weapon deal +3 damage.

name: Dagger Mastery
effect: Your Melee Attacks made with a one-handed light weapon deal +5 damage when you have Advantage on the target.

name: Ambidexterity
effect: While Dual Wielding, your Melee Attacks deal additional damage equal to you STR score (if your off-hand weapon is Heavy) or AGI score (if it's Light).

name: Shield Expert
effect: When you use a Block action, your shield blocks 3 additional damage.

name: Marksman
effect: Your Ranged Attacks deal +3 damage.

name: Skirmisher
effect:
You can move 1 square after (and if) you hit with a Ranged Basic Attack with a Shortbow.
You can only do this only once per round and only during your turn, and this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Overdraw
effect: The weapon range of longbows is increased by 2.

name: Close Quarter Marksman
effect: Your Ranged Attacks do not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Arcane Reach
effect: The range of all your Spells is increased by 1.

name: War Wizard
effect: Your Spell Area Attacks ignore any Disadvantage, and you can choose not to target your allies in their Area.

name: Spell Flow
effect: After casting any spell while under any attunement, as a free action you may change your current attunement(s) to any other attunement (or attunement combination).

name: Recovery Matrix
effect: When you cast a Spell that costs Energy, you gain Regeneration.

name: Intensity
effect: Burning inflicted by you makes the target lose 3 Wounds instead of 2.

name: Pyromancer
effect: While attuned to Fire, whenever you inflict Fire damage you also inflict Burning on the target.

name: Razor Shards
effect: While attuned to Frost, whenever you Cripple, Chill or Immobilize a target, you also inflict Bleeding.

name: Deep Freeze
effect: While attuned to Frost, whenever you Cripple a target, you may Chill it instead.
